ygData.subject: RE: RE: Simply Charming...Leatherfoot Raider Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: The first part of the quest returns an item that is not halfling only.  The second part requires turning in the first cap and a dragoon dirk to get the better
ygData.messageBody:
The first part of the quest returns an item that is not halfling only. The
second part requires turning in the first cap and a dragoon dirk to get the
better halfling only one. At least that is my understanding from a guild
member who completed it. I had one from the old quest and he compared them
and said they are virtually the same.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 11:43 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...


From: <kim@...>

On Tue, 14 Dec 1999, Jeff Illian wrote:

> From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
>
> What's drops the Siryn Hood? I currently use a leatherfoot skullcap (+10
> Cha, AC4).

Non-halflings can still equip those? Or was it another
guise-job where the old ones remain but new ones are
halfling-only?

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
